name: Zombie camping
description:
Zombie camping is a third person shooter based in a forest camping where zombies are coming in waves trying to kill you, as you progress, the waves will become harder and you will unlock new weapons!

Every player can earn money and spend it at weapons, ammo and medications. All of this will be used against enemies.

Fight for your survival, it's kill or be killed!

Features:

  • 5 types of weapon with the possibility of upgrading
  • Waves of enemy
  • Different zombie
